text: The Promoters of our Company as on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus are:

As on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, our Individual Promoter does not hold any Equity Shares or CCPS in our Company. As on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, our Corporate Promoter holds 87,340,796 Equity Shares of face value of ₹2 each, aggregating to 69.46% of the pre-Offer Equity Share capital of our Company and 61.81% of the pre-Offer Equity Share capital of our Company on a fully diluted basis (i.e., assuming conversion of all outstanding 15,317,134 CCPS of face value of ₹10 each of our Company into maximum of 15,317,134 Equity Shares of face value of ₹2 each; and (b) pursuant to exercise of all outstanding RSUs that are vested as on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus under the RSU Plans). Further, as on date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, our Corporate Promoter does not hold any CCPS in our Company.

For further details of shareholding in our Company of our Corporate Promoter, please see the section titled "Capital Structure – Share capital build up of our Promoters (including the Promoter Selling Shareholder)", on page 102.
Anil Agarwal, aged 73 years, is the Individual Promoter of our Company.
Details of his date of birth and address are as follows:

Anil Agarwal studied at Miller High School, Patna. He was appointed to the board in May 2003 and is the executive chairman of Vedanta Resources since March 2005. He became the non-executive chairman of Vedanta Limited in April 2020. He founded the group in 1976 and has over four decades of entrepreneurial and mining experience. He has led the Vedanta group and has helped shape its strategic vision. Under his leadership, Vedanta has grown from an Indian domestic miner into a global natural resources group.
His PAN number is AFWPA3200K and he currently does not have a driving license or an Aadhaar card.

Our Company confirms that the permanent account number, bank account numbers and passport number of the Individual Promoter, will be submitted to the Stock Exchanges at the time of filing this Draft Red Herring Prospectus.

Our Corporate Promoter was incorporated on June 2, 2006, as a private limited company under the Companies Act, 2001 of Mauritius with the Registrar of Companies, Republic of Mauritius with the Global Business License Number 63181 C1/GBL. The registered office of our Corporate Promoter is located at C/o IQ EQ Corporate Services (Mauritius) Ltd, 33, Edith Cavell Street, Port Louis 11324, Mauritius.

As on the date of this Draft Red Herring Prospectus, our Corporate Promoter, as authorized under its constitutional documents, is engaged in the business of investment holding, with its main objects being (i) carrying out global business activities in accordance with the Financial Services Act, 2007 and (ii) engaging in business activities as per the business plan and its licensing conditions. There has been no change in the activities of our Corporate Promoter, since its incorporation.
